name: FIRE TEMPLE
description:
You play an adventurer that stepped into an Dungeon right in this moment. Your job is to explore this dungeon and get out back to the surface of the world, alive.

The game is only for exploring and collecting. In know it is left out of enemys and more different puzzles and more. Maybe I'll add that later when I have time.

But before I'll add more, enjoy this lil' adventure and give some feedback. :)

Credits for all the artist out there for lending some things like textures, sound, music and 3d models.
